Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: EA photography
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the camera. This is my second Nikon and the D7100 rocks...the 70-300 lens is a great addition. The camera shoots some of the best quality photos I've seen. Don't second guess yourself on this one.

Reviews.Title: D7100 kit
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Thanks, I loved the accessories that the kit came with. The camera works great with the zoom ( 70-300mm )I read some reviews that it starts looking bad after 250mm but its not true.
